desc: For the last 25 years Les Fleurs Dimitry has provided its professional services by planning, designing and organizing all your personal events. For all your flower, plant, event needs, contact Les Fleurs Dimitry.

layout.text: All you need is love...and some roses.
With Valentine's Day around the corner, give that special someone some roses to compliment those morning cuddles and kisses. Fleurs Dimitry has a variety of different colours available.
